verses.verse: וַיֵּאָסְפ֤וּ <S%H622><s%> vai-ye-'a-se-Fu gathered themselves together כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol and all הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And all the people כְּאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ke-'Ish man אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, as one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- at הָ֣רְח֔וֹב <S%H7339><s%> ha-re-Chov, into the street אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei that [was] before שַֽׁעַר־ <S%H8179><s%> sha-'ar- gate הַמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim; the water וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru and they spake לְעֶזְרָ֣א <S%H5830><s%> le-'ez-Ra unto Ezra הַסֹּפֵ֔ר <S%H5608><s%> has-so-Fer, the scribe לְהָבִ֗יא <S%H935><s%> le-ha-Vi, to bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- סֵ֙פֶר֙ <S%H5612><s%> se-fer the book תּוֹרַ֣ת <S%H8451><s%> to-Rat of the law מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, of Moses אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah had commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- for יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. to Israel

וַיָּבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vi brought עֶזְרָ֣א <S%H5830><s%> 'ez-Ra And Ezra הַ֠כֹּהֵן <S%H3548><s%> Hak-ko-hen the priest אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַתּוֹרָ֞ה <S%H8451><s%> hat-to-Rah the law לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before הַקָּהָל֙ <S%H6951><s%> hak-ka-Hal the congregation מֵאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> me-'Ish both of men וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- against אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah, and women וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol and all מֵבִ֣ין <S%H995><s%> me-Vin with understanding לִשְׁמֹ֑עַ <S%H8085><s%> lish-Mo-a'; and all that could hear בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom day אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad upon the first לַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁבִיעִֽי׃ <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I. of the seventh

וַיִּקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-ra- And he read בוֹ֩ vo לִפְנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei therein before הָרְח֜וֹב <S%H7339><s%> ha-re-Chov the street אֲשֶׁ֣ר׀ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei that [was] before שַֽׁעַר־ <S%H8179><s%> sha-'ar- gate הַמַּ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim, the water מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָאוֹר֙ <S%H216><s%> ha-'Or from the morning עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until מַחֲצִ֣ית <S%H4276><s%> ma-cha-Tzit half הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, in נֶ֛גֶד <S%H5048><s%> Ne-ged the presence הָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H376><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim of men וְהַנָּשִׁ֖ים <S%H802><s%> ve-han-na-Shim and the women וְהַמְּבִינִ֑ים <S%H995><s%> ve-ham-me-vi-Nim; and those that could understand וְאָזְנֵ֥י <S%H241><s%> ve-'a-ze-Nei and the ears כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol and all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am of all the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to סֵ֥פֶר <S%H5612><s%> Se-fer [were attentive] unto the book הַתּוֹרָֽה׃ <S%H8451><s%> hat-to-Rah. of the law

וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֞ד <S%H5975><s%> vai-ya-'a-Mod stood עֶזְרָ֣א <S%H5830><s%> 'ez-Ra And Ezra הַסֹּפֵ֗ר <S%H5608><s%> has-so-Fer, the scribe עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon מִגְדַּל־ <S%H4026><s%> mig-dal- upon a pulpit עֵץ֮ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz of wood אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su which they had made לַדָּבָר֒ <S%H1697><s%> lad-da-Var for the purpose וַיַּֽעֲמֹ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> vai-ya-'a-Mod him stood אֶצְל֡וֹ <S%H681><s%> etz-Lo and beside מַתִּתְיָ֡ה <S%H4993><s%> mat-tit-Yah Mattithiah וְשֶׁ֡מַע <S%H8087><s%> ve-She-ma' and Shema וַ֠עֲנָיָה <S%H6043><s%> Va-'a-na-yah and Anaiah וְאוּרִיָּ֧ה <S%H223><s%> ve-'u-ri-Yah and Urijah וְחִלְקִיָּ֛ה <S%H2518><s%> ve-chil-ki-Yah and Hilkiah וּמַעֲשֵׂיָ֖ה <S%H4641><s%> u-ma-'a-se-Yah and Maaseiah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on יְמִינ֑וֹ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-No; on his right hand וּמִשְּׂמֹאל֗וֹ <S%H8040><s%> u-mis-se-mo-Lo, and on his left hand פְּ֠דָיָה <S%H6305><s%> Pe-da-yah Pedaiah וּמִֽישָׁאֵ֧ל <S%H4332><s%> u-mi-sha-'El and Mishael וּמַלְכִּיָּ֛ה <S%H4441><s%> u-mal-ki-Yah and Malchiah וְחָשֻׁ֥ם <S%H2828><s%> ve-cha-Shum and Hashum וְחַשְׁבַּדָּ֖נָה <S%H2806><s%> ve-chash-bad-Da-nah and Hashbadana זְכַרְיָ֥ה <S%H2148><s%> ze-char-Yah Zechariah מְשֻׁלָּֽם׃ <S%H4918><s%> me-shul-Lam. [and] Meshullam פ Peh

וַיִּפְתַּ֨ח <S%H6605><s%> vai-yif-Tach opened עֶזְרָ֤א <S%H5830><s%> 'ez-Ra And Ezra הַסֵּ֙פֶר֙ <S%H5612><s%> has-Se-fer the book לְעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> le-'ei-Nei in the sight כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol of all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, of all the people כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am it all the people הָיָ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah; become וּכְפִתְח֖וֹ <S%H6605><s%> u-che-fit-Cho opened עָֽמְד֥וּ <S%H5975><s%> 'a-me-Du stood up כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am. the people

וַיְבָ֣רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> vay-Va-rech blessed עֶזְרָ֔א <S%H5830><s%> 'ez-Ra, And Ezra אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him God הַגָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol; the great וַיַּֽעֲנ֨וּ <S%H6030><s%> vai-ya-'a-Nu answered כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol and all הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And all the people אָמֵ֤ן׀ <S%H543><s%> 'a-Men Amen אָמֵן֙ <S%H543><s%> 'a-Men Amen בְּמֹ֣עַל <S%H4607><s%> be-Mo-'al with lifting up יְדֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> ye-dei-Hem, their hands וַיִּקְּד֧וּ <S%H6915><s%> vai-yik-ke-Du and they bowed וַיִּשְׁתַּחֲוֻּ֛ <S%H7812><s%> vai-yish-ta-cha-Vu their heads and worshipped לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אַפַּ֥יִם <S%H639><s%> 'ap-Pa-yim with [their] faces אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-re-tzah. to the ground

וְיֵשׁ֡וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> ve-ye-Shu-a' Also Jeshua וּבָנִ֡י <S%H1137><s%> u-va-Ni and Bani וְשֵׁרֵ֥בְיָ֣ה׀ <S%H8274><s%> ve-she-Re-ve-Yah and Sherebiah יָמִ֡ין <S%H3226><s%> ya-Min Jamin עַקּ֡וּב <S%H6126><s%> 'ak-Kuv Akkub שַׁבְּתַ֣י׀ <S%H7678><s%> shab-be-Tai Shabbethai הֽוֹדִיָּ֡ה <S%H1941><s%> ho-di-Yah Hodijah מַעֲשֵׂיָ֡ה <S%H4641><s%> ma-'a-se-Yah Maaseiah קְלִיטָ֣א <S%H7042><s%> ke-li-Ta Kelita עֲזַרְיָה֩ <S%H5838><s%> 'a-zar-Yah Azariah יוֹזָבָ֨ד <S%H3107><s%> yo-za-Vad Jozabad חָנָ֤ן <S%H2605><s%> cha-Nan Hanan פְּלָאיָה֙ <S%H6411><s%> pe-la-Yah Pelaiah וְהַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> ve-hal-vi-Yim, and the Levites מְבִינִ֥ים <S%H995><s%> me-vi-Nim to understand אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am caused the people לַתּוֹרָ֑ה <S%H8451><s%> lat-to-Rah; the law וְהָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ve-ha-'Am and the people עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and עָמְדָֽם׃ <S%H5975><s%> 'a-me-Dam. abide

וַֽיִּקְרְא֥וּ <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-re-'U So they read בַסֵּ֛פֶר <S%H5612><s%> vas-Se-fer in the book בְּתוֹרַ֥ת <S%H8451><s%> be-to-Rat in the law הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him of God מְפֹרָ֑שׁ <S%H6567><s%> me-fo-Rash; distinctly וְשׂ֣וֹם <S%H7760><s%> ve-Som and gave שֶׂ֔כֶל <S%H7922><s%> Se-chel, the sense וַיָּבִ֖ינוּ <S%H995><s%> vai-ya-Vi-nu and caused [them] to understand בַּמִּקְרָֽא׃ <S%H4744><s%> bam-mik-Ra. the reading ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said נְחֶמְיָ֣ה <S%H5166><s%> ne-chem-Yah And Nehemiah ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu who הַתִּרְשָׁ֡תָא <S%H8660><s%> hat-tir-Sha-ta which [is] the Tirshatha וְעֶזְרָ֣א <S%H5830><s%> ve-'ez-Ra and Ezra הַכֹּהֵ֣ן׀ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen the priest הַסֹּפֵ֡ר <S%H5608><s%> has-so-Fer the scribe וְהַלְוִיִּם֩ <S%H3881><s%> ve-hal-vi-Yim and the Levites הַמְּבִינִ֨ים <S%H995><s%> ham-me-vi-Nim that taught אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am the people לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol to all הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, unto all the people הַיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom This day קָדֹֽשׁ־ <S%H6918><s%> ka-dosh- [is] holy הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> hu This לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem, your God אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּֽתְאַבְּל֖וּ <S%H56><s%> tit-'ab-be-Lu mourn וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- not תִּבְכּ֑וּ <S%H1058><s%> tiv-Ku; not nor weep כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בוֹכִים֙ <S%H1058><s%> vo-Chim wept כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- for all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, For all the people כְּשָׁמְעָ֖ם <S%H8085><s%> ke-sha-me-'Am when they heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei the words הַתּוֹרָֽה׃ <S%H8451><s%> hat-to-Rah. of the law

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then he said לָהֶ֡ם la-Hem לְכוּ֩ <S%H1980><s%> le-Chu Go אִכְל֨וּ <S%H398><s%> 'ich-Lu eat מַשְׁמַנִּ֜ים <S%H4924><s%> mash-man-Nim the fat וּשְׁת֣וּ <S%H8354><s%> u-she-Tu and drink מַֽמְתַקִּ֗ים <S%H4477><s%> mam-tak-Kim, the sweet וְשִׁלְח֤וּ <S%H7971><s%> ve-shil-Chu and send מָנוֹת֙ <S%H4490><s%> ma-nOt portions לְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> le-'Ein has nothing נָכ֣וֹן <S%H3559><s%> na-Chon unto them for whom nothing is prepared ל֔וֹ lo, כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for קָד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> ka-Doosh [is] holy הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom for [this] day לַאֲדֹנֵ֑ינוּ <S%H136><s%> la-'a-do-Nei-nu; to our Lord וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- not תֵּ֣עָצֵ֔בוּ <S%H6087><s%> te-'a-Tze-vu, neither be ye sorry כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for חֶדְוַ֥ת <S%H2304><s%> ched-Vat for the joy יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> hi he מָֽעֻזְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H4581><s%> Ma-'uz-ze-Chem. is your strength

וְהַלְוִיִּ֞ם <S%H3881><s%> ve-hal-vi-Yim So the Levites מַחְשִׁ֤ים <S%H2814><s%> mach-Shim stilled לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol all הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am all the people לֵאמֹ֣ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying הַ֔סּוּ <S%H2013><s%> Has-su, Hold your peace כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom for the day קָדֹ֑שׁ <S%H6918><s%> ka-Dosh; [is] holy וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- not תֵּעָצֵֽבוּ׃ <S%H6087><s%> te-'a-Tze-vu. neither be ye grieved

וַיֵּלְכ֨וּ <S%H1980><s%> vai-ye-le-Chu went כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol All הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And all the people לֶאֱכֹ֤ל <S%H398><s%> le-'e-Chol to eat וְלִשְׁתּוֹת֙ <S%H8354><s%> ve-lish-tOt and to drink וּלְשַׁלַּ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> u-le-shal-Lach and to send מָנ֔וֹת <S%H4490><s%> ma-Not, portions וְלַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> ve-la-'a-Sot and to make שִׂמְחָ֣ה <S%H8057><s%> sim-Chah mirth גְדוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah; great כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki because הֵבִ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H995><s%> he-Vi-nu because they had understood בַּדְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> bad-de-va-Rim, the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הוֹדִ֖יעוּ <S%H3045><s%> ho-Di-'u that were declared לָהֶֽם׃ la-Hem. ס sa-Mek

וּבַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> u-vai-Yom day הַשֵּׁנִ֡י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni And on the second נֶאֶסְפוּ֩ <S%H622><s%> ne-'es-Fu were gathered together רָאשֵׁ֨י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei the chief הָאָב֜וֹת <S%H1><s%> ha-'a-Vot of the fathers לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol all הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, of all the people הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> ve-hal-vi-Yim, and the Levites אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to עֶזְרָ֖א <S%H5830><s%> 'ez-Ra unto Ezra הַסֹּפֵ֑ר <S%H5608><s%> has-so-Fer; the scribe וּלְהַשְׂכִּ֖יל <S%H7919><s%> u-le-has-Kil even to understand אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei the words הַתּוֹרָֽה׃ <S%H8451><s%> hat-to-Rah. of the law
